nodes.title: Skills and Tooling Tree
nodes.excerpt: Tool registry, skill implementations, and CLI utilities.
nodes.bodyMD:
This tree maps the skills system, tool registry, and CLI tooling used by Helix Ask and related runtimes.

Minimal artifact: skills catalog with wiring map.

nodes.title: Tool Registry
nodes.excerpt: Tool specs, safety profiles, and registry helpers.
nodes.bodyMD:
Tool specs and registry wiring (shared/skills.ts, server/skills/index.ts).

Minimal artifact: tool registry summary.

nodes.title: Tool Routing
nodes.bodyMD:
Tool registration and routing (server/routes/agi.plan.ts).

Minimal artifact: tool registration map.

nodes.title: Physics Skills
nodes.excerpt: Warp, GR grounding, and curvature tools.
nodes.bodyMD:
Physics tools (server/skills/physics.warp.ask.ts, server/skills/physics.warp.viability.ts, server/skills/physics.gr.assistant.ts, server/skills/physics.gr.grounding.ts, server/skills/physics.curvature.ts).

Minimal artifact: physics tool catalog.

nodes.title: Docs and Repo Skills
nodes.excerpt: Docs extraction, citation checks, and repo tools.
nodes.bodyMD:
Docs and repo tools (server/skills/docs.readme.ts, server/skills/docs.heading.section.md.ts, server/skills/docs.table.extract.ts, server/skills/docs.contradiction.scan.ts, server/skills/docs.evidence.search.md.ts, server/skills/docs.evidence.search.pdf.ts, server/skills/repo.graph.search.ts, server/skills/repo.diff.review.ts, server/skills/repo.patch.simulate.ts, server/skills/citation.verify.span.ts, server/skills/numeric.extract.units.ts).

Minimal artifact: documentation tool catalog.

nodes.title: Media Skills
nodes.excerpt: Luma, noise, vision, speech, and fashion tools.
nodes.bodyMD:
Media tools (server/skills/luma.generate.ts, server/skills/luma.http.ts, server/skills/noise.gen.cover.ts, server/skills/noise.gen.fingerprint.ts, server/skills/stt.whisper.ts, server/skills/stt.whisper.http.ts, server/skills/vision.http.ts, server/skills/fashion.looks.ts).

Minimal artifact: media tool catalog.

nodes.title: Telemetry Skills
nodes.bodyMD:
Telemetry tools (server/skills/telemetry.badges.ts, server/skills/telemetry.panels.ts, server/skills/telemetry.crosscheck.docs.ts).

Minimal artifact: telemetry tool catalog.

nodes.title: CLI and Tooling
nodes.bodyMD:
CLI utilities and tooling (cli/casimir-verify.ts, cli/physics-ask.ts, cli/physics-validate.ts, cli/gr-agent-loop.ts, tools/tokenizer-verify.ts, tools/generate-tokenizer-canary.ts, scripts/llm-local-smoke.ts).

Minimal artifact: CLI toolbox map.
